queries.description: Rvalue references are forwarded with std::move and forwarding reference with std::forward.
queries.name: Rvalue references are forwarded with std::move and forwarding reference with std::forward

A18-9-2.title: Forwarding values to other functions shall be done via: (1) std::move if the value is an rvalue reference, (2) std::forward if the value is forwarding reference.

queries.description: The std::move shall not be used on objects declared const or const&.

queries.description: An argument to std::forward shall not be subsequently used.
queries.name: An argument to std::forward shall not be subsequently used

queries.description: "forward" parameters declared as T && shall always be forwarded.
